name: Tower-Defense
description:
Tower defense is a simple game where the goal is kill all the enemies before they reach the end of the path.
Features:

  • Build towers and upgrade them
  • Kill enemies and earn money
  • Various enemy types
  • Background effects such as warplanes
  • 10 different Maps
  • Bugs ;)

Maybe Features in the Future:

  • Online Highscore
  • Custom map support
  • more Towers

Tutorial:

  1. To build a tower, click and hold the left mouse button.(cost: 200)
  2. To open the tower menu click on a tower.
    • Level 1 -> Level 2 (cost: 400)
    • Level 2 -> Level 3 (cost: 600)

Let's Defend!
